basic.description:
This course provides intermediate level training in applied statistics for students studying public and non-profit management, policy analysis, and related areas. The aim is to provide students with the knowledge of analytical methods to effectively and responsibly interpret
and apply statistical analysis conducted by others. Restriction: open only to students who have attained a minimum ¿A-¿grade in MPA-801. 1.5 credit hours
basic.subject: MPA
basic.title: Analytical Methods for Public Policy

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite for MPA 808 requires an A- in MPA 801
